EmailTemplate.name: Rebillia NPS.Survey Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: We want your feedback on Rebillia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for recently trying out BigCommerce’s integration with Rebillia. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for recently trying out BigCommerce’s integration with Rebillia. To help us continue to improve our service, we’d like to ask you a few short questions about your experience. This survey should take less than 5 minutes to complete.
Take the Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/QYRC3RP]]> Thanks, Mike Chorazak Director of Product Marketing, BigCommerce
